title: Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
markings: Publisher's monogram embossed, lower left:  FM [Franca Manchini]
signed: Printed in gray ink, below image, lower right:  BALLA/FUTURISTA
description: Large royal blue sphere in middle of sheet with nude woman inside, with her arms outstretched to edges of sphere.  Her eyes and mouth are colored green.  Crisscrossing vertical and horizontal elipses envelope woman.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original.
ca. 1980 reproduction of 1915–1925 original. Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen. 1999-6-5-14.
